title: What will be the next invention on the level of innovation of the iPhone? - Quora

response.answer_text: iPhone was an innovative approach, with a reasonable level of new technology. But don’t look back with rose-tinted glasses, it had some flaws and was much, much slower & more limited than today. There have already been products released that are as innovative. iPad had virtually no “new” technology inside it was a hugely innovative approach to tablets. That’s what flawed everyone and what lead to a lot of criticism. The idea of two products - a phone and a tablet - sharing the same OS didn’t make a lot of sense. Surely that made them the same thing, and as the iPhone came first the iPad was “a big iPhone”. Apple Watch had a lot of new technology: Apple haptic engine, custom processor, digital crown, custom heart-rate sensor, easily interchangeable bands, etc. Yet the concept of a smartwatch was at least familiar to people.

A) The iPhone wasn’t that innovative, it was far more iterative. B) It continues to innovate and has been. world changing product. I obviously don’t know what the next thing will be, but it feels to me that it will be in healthcare.
